welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cumnock, the charming town nestled in the heart of Scotland known for its stunning countryside and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our unique culture and enjoy all that Cumnock has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prestwick Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Prestwick Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport houses all check-in, baggage claim, and security areas.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Glasgow International Airport services primarily international flights and includes duty-free shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
